title: Marketplace Tech for Tuesday, December 30, 2014
teaser: Airing on Tuesday, December 30, 2014: First up on today's show, we talk with Alp Işın, an artist in Charlottesville, VA, about staying with friends to squeeze more money out of his apartment on Airbnb. Plus, Gerardine Botte, Director of Chemical and Biomolecular Engineering at Ohio University, talks about converting urine to water and energy on the Mars One mission.
description: Airing on Tuesday, December 30, 2014: First up on today's show, we talk with Alp Işın, an artist in Charlottesville, VA, about staying with friends to squeeze more money out of his apartment on Airbnb. Plus, Gerardine Botte, Director of Chemical and Biomolecular Engineering at Ohio University, talks about converting urine to water and energy on the Mars One mission.
